body_content.explanation: Unseasoned food has not had salt, pepper, herbs, or spices added to it:
examples: Add salt if you use unseasoned chicken stock.

body_content.explanation: Unseasoned wood has not been left to dry in the usual way before being used:
examples: He makes sculptures of unseasoned wood.
The use of green, unseasoned timber is thought to be a reason for the church's crooked spire.

body_content.explanation: An unseasoned iron pan has not been protected with oil:
examples: Rusting is common in unseasoned cast iron pans.
You can buy unseasoned, "bare" cast iron cookware.

body_content.explanation: not having a lot of experience of doing something and therefore not knowing how to do it well:
examples: Only an unseasoned editor would want to work in this way.
These judgments are extremely difficult for the unseasoned investor.
